table.name: vtiger_maintenance
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_maintenance` (`maintenanceid` int(11) NOT NULL, `maintenanceno` varchar(100) default NULL, `maintenance_tks_termscondition` varchar(250) default NULL ,`maintenance_tks_description` varchar(250) default NULL ,`maintenance_tks_subject` varchar(32) default NULL ,`maintenance_tks_quotename` varchar(19) default NULL ,`maintenance_tks_projectdate` date default NULL ,`maintenance_tks_duedate` date default NULL ,`maintenance_tks_contactname` varchar(32) default NULL ,`maintenance_tks_mobileno` varchar(100) default NULL ,`maintenance_tks_primaryemail` varchar(100) default NULL ,`maintenance_tks_status` varchar(100) default NULL ,`maintenance_tks_billingaddress` varchar(250) default NULL ,`maintenance_tks_billingstate` varchar(32) default NULL ,`maintenance_tks_billingcity` varchar(32) default NULL ,`maintenance_tks_billingpostalc` varchar(32) default NULL ,`maintenance_tks_stcincentive` decimal(19,5) default NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`maintenanceid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_maintenancecf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_maintenancecf` (`maintenanceid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`maintenanceid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_maintenance_user_field
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_maintenance_user_field` (`recordid` int(25) NOT NULL, `userid` int(25) NOT NULL, `starred` varchar(100) default NULL , KEY (`vtiger_maintenance_user_field`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
